name: PsychoFall
description:
You have made a leap of sorts and find yourself falling and navigating through your philosophical psyche. A casual experience for players who choose to just explore the psychic apparatus as presented, or an intense experience for those who choose to explore to collect the five remnants to unlock each part of the psychic apparatus.

Though The game lacks "Lore" of sorts, there is a Backstory to the character you play as, but initially it is left for you to play as yourself and define your experience.

DEFINING FEATURES
-One Touch Navigation.
-Abstract Engaging Level Design.
-Dynamic Depth Color Fade.

HOW TO PLAY:
-Explore each level, Collect all five "Remnants" of a level in a single fall to unlock the next level.

>>>PsychoFall Original Soundtrack<<<
Release Date: 04-02-15
>>Listen Now on SoundCloud!

A Michael T Moreno Game.
